t: Kelly Clarkson Created a New Home Collection for Wayfair Inspired by Her Move to New York
s: September 23, 2024 - It’s hard to believe that Kelly Clarkson Home, the Grammy Award-winning artist and Emmy award-winning talk show host’s line for Wayfair, launched just four years ago. Since its start in April 2020, the namesake brand has dropped thousands of furniture and decor pieces and become one of the retailer’s top-selling lines. The brand consists of French country and vintage-inspired pieces with influences from the singer’s Texas roots. Clarkson’s individual collections ...
